original_text: After six days Jesus took Peter, James and John with him and led them up a high mountain, where they were all alone. There he was transfigured before them.
korean_text: 엿새 후에 예수께서 베드로와 야고보와 요한을 데리시고 따로 높은 산에 올라가셨더니 그들 앞에서 변형되사

sentences.original_text: Jesus took Peter, James and John with him
and led them up a high mountain

sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 다 함께 혼자 있는 곳에서

sentences.original_text: There he was transfigured before them
